content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® b201 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com aventura cabled hat size adult medium materials aventura 1 100g skein shown in color 45 gingerbread needles 16 circulars size us 7 & 9 double points size us 9 cable needle stitch marker gauge 4 sts =1 over st st on larger needles check gauge before working hat k1/p1 ribbing * k1 p1 repeat around c6b place next 3 sts onto cable needle hold in back of work work k3 sts k3 sts from cable needle begin with smaller needles loosely cast on 96 sts place marker and join to work in the round taking care not to twist the sts begin working in 1x1 ribbing for 1 5 increasing to 108 sts on last round with smaller needles by working * k3 m1 k2 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * around 108 sts 12 repeats of 9 sts change to larger circular needle and begin cable pattern rounds 1- 4 * k6 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * around round 5 * c6b p1 k1 p1 repeat from * around rounds 6- 8 * k6 p1 k1 p1 repeat from * around repeat rounds 1- 8 - 3 more times for a total of 4 cable crosses if a much longer slouchier hat is desired there is enough yarn work one more set of row 1-8 work rounds 1- 2 of cable pattern above and begin decreases as shown below changing to double points when needed decreases round 1 * k6 p2tog p1 repeat from * around round 2 * k6 p2 repeat from * around round 3 * c6b p2 repeat from * around last cable cross round 4 * k6 p2tog repeat from * around round 5 * k6 p1 repeat from * around round 6 * ssk k4 p1 repeat from * around round 7 * k3 k2tog p1 repeat from * around round 8 * ssk k2 p1 repeat from * around round 9 * k1 k2tog p1 repeat from * around abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s stitch es ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together in that position k2tog = knit 2 sts together tbl = through the back loop m1 = make 1 = place bar between last st and next st onto needle and knit into back of it to increase 1 st p2tog = purl 2 sts together p l y m o u t h y a r n® b201 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com round 10 * ssk p1 repeat from * around round 11 * k2tog repeat from * around 12 sts round 12 * k2tog repeat from * around 6 sts cut yarn and thread through remaining sts pull up tight and anchor to inside weave in all ends ©2024 plymouth yarn
